episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of The Avengers' battle in New York City, the world attempts to come to grips with the presence of superheroes, gods, and aliens in their midst. Agent Coulson is resurrected under mysterious circumstances and forms an elite team of agents from S.H.I.E.L.D. to keep track of a secret organization known as The Rising Tide. Meanwhile, they must deal with other menaces, such as a man who suddenly finds himself with vast uncontrollable power.

Coulson and his S.H.I.E.L.D. agents travel to Peru to investigate an object of unknown origin, codenamed 0-8-4. But when he runs into Comandante Camilla Reyes, more than just sparks fly at 30,000 feet.

episodes.name: The Asset
episodes.overview: When the brilliant scientist, Dr. Franklin Hall, is kidnapped, Agent Coulson and his S.H.I.E.L.D. agents must race against the clock to locate him. Skye is their only way in – pushing the team to their limits when the entire plan turns upside-down.

episodes.name: Eye Spy
episodes.overview: Agent Coulson and the S.H.I.E.L.D. team try to track down a mysterious woman who has single-handedly committed numerous high-stakes heists. But when the woman’s identity is revealed, a troubling secret stands to ruin Coulson.

episodes.name: Girl in the Flower Dress
episodes.overview: An elusive girl in a flower dress may hold the key to the mystery that brings Coulson and his team to Asia to rescue a young man with an unusual and dangerous power; and Skye has a secret that jeopardizes her relationship with the team right when they need her most.

episodes.name: F.Z.Z.T.
episodes.overview: When mysterious floating bodies turn up, Coulson and his team must hunt down an elusive killer before they strike again, everyone at risk.

episodes.name: The Hub
episodes.overview: Dangerous secrets are being kept from Coulson’s team, and he works the system to save Ward and Fitz when they are sent on a Level 8 classified mission that may end in tragedy.

episodes.name: The Well
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the events chronicled in the film "Thor: The Dark World", Coulson and his team pick up the pieces - one of which threatens to destroy them.

episodes.name: Repairs
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team are haunted by a mysterious force that threatens to destroy them all, and only a secret from May's past can save them.

episodes.name: The Bridge
episodes.overview: In a shocking cliffhanger episode, Coulson takes the war back to Centipede, and this time he brings in Mike Peterson for some super-soldier support. As they get closer to the truth, startling secrets are revealed and an unexpected twist threatens the team.

episodes.name: The Magical Place
episodes.overview: S.H.I.E.L.D. organizes a full scale hunt for Coulson. Centipede tries to resurface the memories on what happened after Coulson died.

episodes.name: Seeds
episodes.overview: Coulson and May uncover startling information about Skye's past, while the team is swept into a storm at S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy.

episodes.name: T.R.A.C.K.S.
episodes.overview: The team tries to confiscate an important device on a train.

episodes.name: T.A.H.I.T.I.
episodes.overview: Coulson goes on the attack to save Skye--enlisting the aid of Ward's former S.O. John Garrett and uncovers shocking truths about his own life and S.H.I.E.L.D.

episodes.name: Yes Men
episodes.overview: Lady Sif arrives on a hunting mission sent by Odin to find her arch-enemy Lorelei and bring her back to Asgard. It throws the team for a loop when they find themselves in a fight right alongside this powerful powerful Asgardian warrior woman.

episodes.name: End of the Beginning
episodes.overview: Agents Garrett (Bill Paxton) and Triplett are back to help Coulson's team track down S.H.I.E.L.D.'S nefarious enemy--the Clairvoyant. But will Deathlok destroy them all to protect his master's identity?

episodes.name: Turn, Turn, Turn
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team find themselves without anyone they can trust, only to discover that they are trapped with a traitor in their midst.

episodes.name: Providence
episodes.overview: With Colonel Glenn Talbot now on their trail, Coulson and his team seek refuge in the last place anyone would look, where they begin to uncover S.H.I.E.L.D.'s most dangerous secrets--secrets that could destroy them all.

episodes.name: The Only Light in the Darkness
episodes.overview: With their WORLD turned upside down, Coulson races to save the life of his one true love as the mystery of "The Cellist," which began in Marvel's The Avengers, is finally revealed on Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D

episodes.name: Nothing Personal
episodes.overview: With no one left to trust, Agent Maria Hill (Cobie Smulders) teams up with Coulson while S.H.I.E.L.D. is being destroyed.

episodes.name: Ragtag
episodes.overview: Ward's betrayal and Hydra's shocking secrets are revealed as Coulson's team goes undercover on a mission that leaves no one unscathed.

episodes.name: Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. But when the dust settles, Coulson will find that no one’s leaving this battle unscathed. And just when all hope seems lost, they’re joined by the one man who may be able to turn the tide–Nick Fury.

name: Season 1
overview: The first season of the American television series Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., which is based on the Marvel Comics organization S.H.I.E.L.D. (Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division), revolves around the character of Phil Coulson and his team of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents, who are assigned to several dangerous cases.
